mutants.code:
import heapq

def calculate_max_ticket_sales(M, N, seating_capacities):
    max_heap = [-capacity for capacity in seating_capacities]
    heapq.heapify(max_heap)
    max_pounds = 1
    for _ in range(N):
        max_seat_count = heapq.heappop(max_heap)
        max_pounds += -max_seat_count
        max_seat_count += 1
        if max_seat_count < 0:
            heapq.heappush(max_heap, max_seat_count)
    return max_pounds

import heapq

def calculate_max_ticket_sales(M, N, seating_capacities):
    max_heap = [-capacity for capacity in seating_capacities]
    heapq.heapify(max_heap)
    max_pounds = 0
    for _ in range(N):
        max_seat_count = heapq.heappop(max_heap)
        max_pounds -= -max_seat_count
        max_seat_count += 1
        if max_seat_count < 0:
            heapq.heappush(max_heap, max_seat_count)
    return max_pounds

def calculate_max_ticket_sales(M, N, seating_capacities):
    max_heap = [-capacity for capacity in seating_capacities]
    heapq.heapify(max_heap)
    max_pounds = 0
    for _ in range(N):
        max_seat_count = heapq.heappop(max_heap)
        max_pounds += -max_seat_count
        max_seat_count -= 1
        if max_seat_count < 0:
            heapq.heappush(max_heap, max_seat_count)
    return max_pounds

import heapq

def calculate_max_ticket_sales(M, N, seating_capacities):
    max_heap = [+capacity for capacity in seating_capacities]
    heapq.heapify(max_heap)
    max_pounds = 0
    for _ in range(N):
        max_seat_count = heapq.heappop(max_heap)
        max_pounds += -max_seat_count
        max_seat_count += 1
        if max_seat_count < 0:
            heapq.heappush(max_heap, max_seat_count)
    return max_pounds
